settings.title: Stay SteelFit®
settings.newsletter_text: Receive our latest news, offers, and promotions.

settings.copyright_text:
A division of Performance Brands, Inc.
*Statements made on this website have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
Information provided by this website or this company is not a substitute for individual medical advice. For best results supplements should be taken as directed over time, at the recommended dosage in conjunction with a healthy diet and regular exercise program. Results may vary. Label information subject to change. Please check the label of your product for up-to-date information.

settings.title: Stay hydrated with our vegan BCAAs.
20g of plant-based protein.
settings.text: Fuel your active lifestyle, help keep your goals on track, or add additional muscle-building protein into your daily diet with our new plant-based protein powder.*

settings.title: Not all greens formulas are created equal.
settings.text: Packed with 15+ superfoods and added digestive enzymes and probiotics, Steel Greens® offers all the benefits of whole plant foods and then some.*

settings.newsletter_text: Receive our latest news, offers, and promotions.

settings.title: Lose Weight
settings.text: Get past that weight loss plateau and meet your goals with our complete range of weight loss products.

settings.title: Build Muscle
settings.text: Whether looking to pack on serious size or add lean muscle, our products can help you achieve your preferred goal.

settings.title: Healthy Lifestyle
settings.text: Build a better you from the inside out.

settings.title: We're here to help.
settings.text: We are a mindful collective with a focus on healing and wellness, looking to help people return to their authentic self. With our products, you can soothe your soul – and your joints!

settings.title: Something for everyone.
settings.text: We believe that our products help people and that they can have a positive impact on your every day life.

settings.title: Our effective approach.
settings.text: Not all cannabinoid products are created the same. We meticulously source our ingredients and are committed to bringing you only the very best.

settings.title: Feel the difference
settings.subtitle: your body & mind will thank you later.

settings.title: What's the difference between THC and CBD?
settings.subtitle: THC and CBD are both natural compounds found in Cannabis however, THC is the psychoactive which gives you the feeling of being high, while CBD does not contain the same psychoactive effects.

settings.title: Does CBD help with health issues?
settings.subtitle:
Many people use both CBD and THC to help with various health conditions. These conditions include pain relief, seizures, inflammation, anxiety and depression. 

However, these products are not intended to diagnose, prevent, treat, or cure any disease.

settings.title: Can I use CBD in recipes?
settings.subtitle: Sure! It is very common to consume CBD by ingesting edibles or adding oils into your own recipes.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.subtitle: For orders in Canada, you should receive your items within 1 - 3 business days. For orders in the U.S, you should receive your items within 10 business days.

settings.title: How can I keep my products fresh?
settings.subtitle: To keep your products fresh and potent, store them in a dark, dry place and in an airtight container.

settings.title: Do you offer refunds?
settings.subtitle: No, unfortunately due to the nature of our products, we do not offer refunds.

settings.title: You may also be interested in
Benefits
settings.text:
Uplight & ease your mind. Our CBD infused teas reduce anxiety, stress and help your feel calm – without any psychoactive effects.

DOSAGE
Scoop 1/2 to 1 tsp and add it to 2 cups of hot water. 

INGREDIENTS

• 10mg natural hemp extract 🌿
• Blend of lavender, strawberry and peppermint

settings.title: We are SteelFit®. Are you?
settings.text:
SteelFit® is more than a skin fitness and sports nutrition company, it’s a family, and our athletes embody all the same principles as us.

We encourage you to connect with all our athletes, as they are not only valuable sources of knowledge to help you achieve your goals but genuinely amazing people!

settings.title: Rob Kaufman
settings.description:
I create, formulate, and educate daily. I am always thinking of how to give our customers the latest and greatest products to help them achieve their goals. Some of my best ideas come when I’m at the gym.

When I’m not doing all those, I love spending time with my wife Jessica, my son Logan, our three puppies, and playing daily fantasy sports.

settings.title: Stacy Kaufman
settings.description:
The king of cosmetics, Stacy is responsible for formulating our top-selling topical products.

On the weekends you can find Stacy either at the gym or sipping on a Steel Fuel® Mocktail by the pool.

settings.title: Family first from the beginning.
settings.text:
Founded by Stacy and Rob Kaufman, the Father-Son duo works daily to develop and improve the SteelFit® line continually.

Stacy is no stranger to the fitness industry, having invented the first self-tanner used for bodybuilding competitions, Pro Tan®, back in 1987. Since then, Pro Tan® has grown to be the #1 Competition Tanning Product globally, used by athletes in over 125 countries and counting. Stacy's years of experience and connections laid the foundation for SteelFit® to be built on.

When Rob walked into his father's office and told him he wanted to branch off from Pro Tan® and start a supplement line, Stacy looked at him like he was crazy. As a former collegiate athlete, Rob has always had a passion for all things health and wellness. After giving a short "elevator pitch" for SteelFit®, Stacy was sold!

SteelFit® is a culmination of all their years of education, training, and passion combined.

Rob has a hands-on approach to SteelFit® supplements, being involved with all aspects of product development from R&D and flavor development to designing the labels. He creates, formulates, and educates daily. He's always thinking of giving our customers the latest and greatest products to help them achieve their goals. Some of his best ideas come when he's at the gym.

Both Rob and Stacy practice what they preach. Committing to bettering themselves daily and living a healthier lifestyle through the use of SteelFit® supplements.

Quality Formulas

At SteelFit®, we create the highest quality, most effective, best-tasting products on the market. Our products are formulated for optimum results both onstage and off and are designed for all health and wellness enthusiasts, from fitness competitors to weekend warriors and everyone in-between.

Physician formulated with clinical doses of the most cutting-edge, research-validated, patented ingredients our in-house quality control team closely analyzes all our products along with our board-certified physician and his team at VRP Sciences for safety, quality, and efficacy.

SteelFit® products are produced in a state-of-the-art facility located in South Florida. Our manufacturing site is NSF-cGMP compliant and utilizes the latest measuring, blending, quality control, and packaging technologies to deliver the finest quality sports nutrition supplements to our customers.

Whether used individually or stacked together, we guarantee our products will help you achieve your fitness goals.

Why SteelFit®?

Plain and simple, there are too many supplements on the market that are either poor quality, underdosed, ineffective, or dangerous.

We are firm believers in Health is Wealth and strive to give our customers the highest quality, most effective products that they deserve.

At SteelFit®, we don’t cut any corners and believe in using only the highest quality ingredients. Transparency is key, and you’ll never find a proprietary blend on any of our products.

Our motto is simple:

We will never manufacture a product that we personally wouldn’t take or wouldn’t give to our friends and family.

SteelFit® is more than a skin fitness and sports nutrition company. It’s a family.

We appreciate you putting your trust in our family to continue and innovate and engineer the highest quality products to help you achieve your goals.

- Rob and Stacy Kaufman

settings.title: Customer Care
settings.content:
Contact Customer Care:

Email: care@steelfitusa.com

Phone: 1-800-555-8895

Please note: Your order will leave our warehouse within 2-3 business days. Shipping on a small portion of orders may be delayed due to our delivery partners (FedEx, UPS, USPS) as a result of the ongoing COVID-19 situation and a continued surge in shipping. We appreciate your patience during this time.

settings.title: Become an Affiliate
settings.content:
Interested in growing your personal brand in the health and fitness industry? How about making extra money doing what you love?

Then we have the right opportunity for you!

As a member of our team, you'll have access to exclusive promotional items and an opportunity to access early releases of new flavors and products.

Through our affiliate program, you can boost your income by recommending premium SteelFit® products to your friends, family, clients, and followers. With supplements for any goal that your audience is already looking for, all you need to do is mention SteelFit® into those daily interactions.

With tiered commission programs, you'll have the opportunity to earn up to 20% commission on products you sell, one of the highest payouts in the industry!

You'll also get social media tips from our in-house marketing experts to help you transform your social media into a valuable resource.

So what are you waiting for?

Our affiliate program was designed for athletes of all levels to represent the SteelFit® brand. Sign up below, and one of our team members will reach out to you in 2-3 business days.

settings.title: California Proposition 65 Warning
settings.content:
1. WHAT IS CALIFORNIA PROPOSITION 65 (PROPOSITION 65)?

Proposition 65 (formally titled The Safe Drinking Water and Toxic Enforcement Act of 1986) is a California law that was passed by direct voter initiative in 1986.  Proposition 65 applies to any company that creates an exposure to a listed chemical “in the course of doing business”in California, as that phrase is defined by the statute.

Proposition 65 requires warnings to accompany any product that create exposures to any of 800+ chemicals appearing on the Proposition 65list.  Proposition 65 is administered by California's Office ofEnvironmental Health Hazard Assessment (OEHHA), a part of the CaliforniaEnvironmental Protection Agency.

Many of the chemicals listed under Proposition 65 have been routinely used in everyday consumer items for years without documented harm. These items include but are not limited to: plastic water bottles, PVC pipes used in plumbing, heavy metals that occur in nature, scuba gear, and thermoplastic elastomer coated wires, cables, and power cords. On rare occasions, listed chemicals are even "delisted" if new science shows that they do not cause the harm for which they were listed.  New chemicals are also added to the list on a regular basis.

2. WHAT ARE THESE WARNINGS? 

1.   ⚠️ WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including chloroprene, which is known to the State of California to cause cancer.  For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.

2.   ⚠️ WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including lead, which is known to the State of California to cause cancer.  For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov

3.   ⚠️ WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including Di(2-ethylhexyl)phthalate(DEHP), which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.

3. WHAT PRODUCTS HAVE WARNINGS?

These warnings can be found on the following SteelFit®Products:  Hydra Steel®, Steel Slim®, Steel Dreams®, Steel Whey®, Steel Vegan™,Mini Loop Bands, Neoprene-Based Trimmers and our Resistance Bands.

Because these products contain listed chemicals,Proposition 65 requires that they carry these warnings.  Proposition 65 is meant to notify individuals in California of exposures to Prop 65-listed chemicals so that consumers can make informed decisions about their overall chemical exposure from all the products they use.  Prop 65 does not identify dangerous or harmful products.

Proposition 65 does not ban the sale of any products containing these chemicals; it only requires warnings.

4. DOES THIS LAW APPLY EVERYWHERE?

No. Proposition 65 Warnings are only required underCalifornia law.

5. WHAT KINDS OF SUBSTANCES REQUIRE WARNINGS?

Proposition 65 addresses chemicals that the State ofCalifornia has determined cause cancer or birth defects or other reproductive harm at some level, even if these things occur only with very high exposures, or very rarely.  Over 800 chemicals have been listed under CaliforniaProposition 65, and the list continues to grow. You can read more at: www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.

6. SHOULD I BE CONCERNED?

Not necessarily, but you should always be aware of all product warnings. Proposition 65 is meant as a tool to assist you in assessing your overall exposure to chemicals from all sources, so the presence of aProposition 65 warning does not mean that a product is dangerous.

Proposition 65 standards for warnings are often very stringent.

Ultimately, it’s good to keep in mind that a Proposition65 warning does not mean the product is unsafe. All SteelFit® products comply with applicable laws, are third-party tested, and sourced from industry-leading, reputable manufacturers.

8. HOW DO THE CALIFORNIA WARNINGS COMPARE TO FEDERAL AND INTERNATIONAL LIMITS?

California product label warning requirements are not the same as federal and international safety standards/requirements. Proposition 65serves a different purpose from many other requirements, covers different chemicals, and sets different exposure thresholds.  Proposition 65standards for warnings are often very stringent. This can cause confusion for consumers regarding products sold in California, and what is required else wherein the U.S.A., as well as the rest of the world. Our products also comply with all applicable federal laws, and the laws of other jurisdictions where they are sold.

9. SUMMARY

Proposition 65 warnings are seen throughout California in a wide range of settings, including but not limited to: coffee shops, health food stores, restaurants, gyms, grocery stores, schools, hospitals, hotels, gas stations, parking garages, and on a wide variety of consumer products.

In addition, as of August 30, 2018, internet and mail-order retailers are required to provide Proposition 65 warnings on their websites or in catalogs if they sell products that create exposures to listed chemicals.

For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov. As always, if you are concerned, we would encourage you to consult with a qualified healthcare professional in regards to using these products.
